verses.verse: Then you will say <S%H559><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> "I will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee, O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> For although Thou wast <S%H599><s%> angry <S%H599><s%> with me, Thine anger <S%H639><s%> is turned <S%H7725><s%> away, <S%H7725><s%> And Thou dost comfort <S%H5162><s%> me.

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> I will trust <S%H982><s%> and not be afraid; <S%H6342><s%> For the Lord <S%H3050><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song, <S%H2176><s%> And He has become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>"
Therefore you will joyously <S%H8342><s%> draw <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> From the springs <S%H4599><s%> of salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> you will say, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> on His name. <S%H8034><s%> Make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> His deeds <S%H5949><s%> among the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> Make [them] remember <S%H2142><s%> that His name <S%H8034><s%> is exalted. <S%H7682><s%>"

Praise <S%H2167><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in song, <S%H2167><s%> for He has done <S%H6213><s%> excellent <S%H1348><s%> things; <S%H1348><s%> Let this <S%H384><s%> be known <S%H3045><s%> throughout <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Cry <S%H6670><s%> aloud <S%H6670><s%> and shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy, <S%H7442><s%> O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> For great <S%H1419><s%> in your midst <S%H7130><s%> is the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
